hadith.chapterTitle: Leading an Abstemious Life and refraining from the Doubtful
hadith.body:
Hasan bin 'Ali (May Allah be pleased with them) reported: I have retained these words of Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), "Leave what causes you doubt and turn to what does not cause you doubt."

[At- Tirmidhi, who classified it as Hadith Hasan Sahih].
- وعن الحسن بن على رضي الله عنهما، قال‏:‏ حفظت من رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم‏:‏ ‏"‏دع ما يريبك إلى ما لا يريبك‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏رواه الترمذى وقال‏:‏ حديث حسن صحيح‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
